app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps Cooking Channel GO
app_description: Watch Cooking Channel anytime with access to live TV and full episodes of your favorite shows such as Man Fire Food Carnival Eats Food: Fact or Fiction and more. It s FREE with your TV subscription. Just sign in with your TV provider username and password. New episodes are added all the time. With this app you can: WATCH TV THE WAY YOU WANT: Stream live Cooking Channel. New episodes of your favorites are available the same time they air on TV. Binge full seasons and episodes of your favorite Cooking Channel shows including Carnival Eats Man Fire Food Cheap Eats and many many more! Get early access to premieres before they air on TV. Not enough time to finish the video Just simply select the video again when you re ready and you ll be able to continue watching from where you stopped. Closed captioning. Current providers for our app include: DirecTV Dish Time Warner Cable Charter Spectrum AT T U verse Verizon FiOS Cox Optimum Bright House Networks Midcontinent Communications and HUNDREDS more Cooking Channel app can only be used in the United States. Need help Visit us at goapphelp.discovery.com. This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research like Nielsen s TV Ratings. To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them please visit http: www.nielsen.com digitalprivacy for more information. For more information on your California Privacy Rights go to: https: corporate.discovery.com privacy policy cappi
